message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1750000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a valuable asset. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to offer $1600000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your position, $1600000 is a bit lower than I'm hoping for. I'm willing to come down a little further to $1650000. This reflects the value of the product and provides a good margin for both of us. Let's work towards an agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to consider $1625000 as a compromise. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
